org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers

类 MergedInputsBoltWrapper<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.operators.AbstractStreamOperator<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers.BoltWrapper<StormTuple<IN>,OUT>
        • org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers.MergedInputsBoltWrapper<IN,OUT>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, KeyContext, OneInputStreamOperator<StormTuple<IN>,OUT>, StreamOperator<OUT>

    public final class MergedInputsBoltWrapper<IN,OUT>
extends BoltWrapper<StormTuple<IN>,OUT>
    A MergedInputsBoltWrapper is a BoltWrapper that expects input tuples of type StormTuple. It can be used to wrap a multi-input bolt and assumes that all input stream got merged into a StormTuple stream already.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MergedInputsBoltWrapper

        public MergedInputsBoltWrapper(org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt bolt)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new MergedInputsBoltWrapper that wraps the given Storm bolt such that it can be used within a Flink streaming program. The output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:
        bolt - The Storm bolt to be used.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the number of declared output attributes is not with range [0;25].

      • MergedInputsBoltWrapper

        public MergedInputsBoltWrapper(org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt bolt,
                               java.lang.String[] rawOutputs)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new MergedInputsBoltWrapper that wraps the given Storm bolt such that it can be used within a Flink streaming program. The output type can be any type if parameter rawOutput is true and the bolt's number of declared output tuples is 1. If rawOutput is false the output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:
        bolt - The Storm bolt to be used.
        rawOutputs - Contains stream names if a single attribute output stream, should not be of type Tuple1 but be of a raw type.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If rawOuput is true and the number of declared output attributes is not 1 or if rawOuput is false and the number of declared output attributes is not within range [1;25].

      • MergedInputsBoltWrapper

        public MergedInputsBoltWrapper(org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt bolt,
                               java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> rawOutputs)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new MergedInputsBoltWrapper that wraps the given Storm bolt such that it can be used within a Flink streaming program. The output type can be any type if parameter rawOutput is true and the bolt's number of declared output tuples is 1. If rawOutput is false the output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:
        bolt - The Storm bolt to be used.
        rawOutputs - Contains stream names if a single attribute output stream, should not be of type Tuple1 but be of a raw type.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If rawOuput is true and the number of declared output attributes is not 1 or if rawOuput is false and the number of declared output attributes is not with range [1;25].

      • MergedInputsBoltWrapper

        public MergedInputsBoltWrapper(org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt bolt,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> rawOutputs)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new MergedInputsBoltWrapper that wraps the given Storm bolt such that it can be used within a Flink streaming program. The output type can be any type if parameter rawOutput is true and the bolt's number of declared output tuples is 1. If rawOutput is false the output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:
        bolt - The Storm bolt to be used.
        name - The name of the bolt.
        rawOutputs - Contains stream names if a single attribute output stream, should not be of type Tuple1 but be of a raw type.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If rawOuput is true and the number of declared output attributes is not 1 or if rawOuput is false and the number of declared output attributes is not with range [0;25].

    • 方法详细资料

      • processElement

        public void processElement(StreamRecord<StormTuple<IN>> element)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: OneInputStreamOperator
        Processes one element that arrived at this operator. This method is guaranteed to not be called concurrently with other methods of the operator.
        指定者:
        processElement 在接口中 OneInputStreamOperator<StormTuple<IN>,OUT>
        覆盖:
        processElement 在类中 BoltWrapper<StormTuple<IN>,OUT>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
